title: San Francisco / Berkeley Offset printers
content:
I live in Australia but need to find a reputable offset printer in the San Fran/Berkeley area that can provide good printing services. Such as UV SPOT varnishes etc, PMS colour printing. For a good price. Attention to detail etc.

Not normally a question I would post here, but I can see a lot of people knowing where the great printers are.

Cheers
author: gareth

comments.content: There must be at least one of the SF Typophiles that can offer up some options. (I wish I could.)
